metadata.title: CVE-2023-40550 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in Shim when it tried to validate theSBAT information. This issue may expose sensitive data during the system'sboot phase.

criterions.comment: secureboot-db package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
shim-signed package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
shim package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
